name: Evil Plush 3D
description:
Reports of missing people start floring around the area of the old children TV show studio. Traumatized since childhood, our hero return for revenge! Always did he knew there was something evil inside those furry looking creatures. 

- Fight your way through hordes of evil plushies, with not less than 3 unique weapons! 

- Graphics, just like you see on your favorite animated TV series!

- 5 different enemies!

WASD            - Move

SPACE            - Jump

SHIFT             - Crouch

LMB                - Attack

123 or MW - Change weapon

R                        - Reload

E                         - Doors

This was made for the Reload Magazine Game Jam#1. Due little time for the gamejam and being unlucky with some crashes, there is only 1 level atm. Hope you like it, leave a comment! :)
